Class MainForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • MainForm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class MainForm
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Main form class. Contains all information for the swing GUI form as well as methods for when anyone interacts with it.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lucy MacGlashan 15107763
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • MainForm

        public MainForm()
        Contains all information to set up swing GUI form including layout and action listeners for buttons.

    • Method Detail

      • formVisible

        void formVisible(java.lang.Boolean formVisible)
        formVisible function. Sets form fields visible or not visible depending on what is required - e.g. the search box
        Parameters:
        formVisible -

      • listEmployees

        void listEmployees()
        Calls either selectAllEmployees or a search function from EmployeeDAO depending on whether search button has been pressed or displaying all employees. Rewrites the employeeList.

      • displayImage

        void displayImage(byte[] image)
        Clears image panel and adds new image if available
        Parameters:
        image -

      • clearImage

        void clearImage()
        Clears image panel.

      • displayDetails

        void displayDetails()
        If employeeList is empty show search box and show error message. Otherwise display employee info in form fields.

      • previousEmployee

        void previousEmployee()
        Takes one off id number when scrolling through - shows previous employee. Loops back round after reaching beginning.

      • nextEmployee

        void nextEmployee()
        Adds one to id number when scrolling through - shows next employee. Loops back round after reaching end.

      • clearForm

        void clearForm()
        Sets all text fields in form to empty. Sets comboBoxes back to first option.

      • updateEmployee

        void updateEmployee()
        When enter button pressed. Checks if all date fields are selected. Checks if new employee or if it already exists. Pulls info from form and uses it in either insertEmployee to create new or in insertEmployeeeAtId to update existing.

      • deleteEmployee

        void deleteEmployee()
        Calls deleteEmployeeById from EmployeeDAO. Displays first available employee.

      • searchResults

        void searchResults()
        Sets employee list to contain results from search.

      • formatDate

        static java.lang.String formatDate(javax.swing.JComboBox day,
                                   javax.swing.JComboBox month,
                                   javax.swing.JComboBox year)
        Pulls comboBox selections from form and concats them into one date string to go into database.
        Parameters:
        day -
        month -
        year -
        Returns:
        date as string in format dd/mm/yyyy

      • scaleImage

        public javax.swing.ImageIcon scaleImage(javax.swing.ImageIcon imageIcon,
                                        int width,
                                        int height)
        Scales image to appropriate size. Detemines whether width or height of image is larger. Sets larger side to max value and scales the other appropriately.
        Parameters:
        imageIcon -
        width -
        height -
        Returns:
        newly scaled imageicon

      • uploadImage

        public void uploadImage()
        Called when upload image button is pressed. Allows user to select image using file chooser. Adds file to database as blob type.

      • selectedSearchField

        public java.lang.String selectedSearchField()
        Converts combo box selection to a string for SQL query if needed. Only required on job title and start date, others don't need to be changed.
        Returns:
        field name as string to be inserted into sql statement

      • searchInput

        public void searchInput()
        When on the search tab, sets the input to what is required for the field e.g. text box for name, combo box for date.
